title: Old Wounds
description: Newly promoted Captain, Ed, is taken aback when his ex-wife is assigned as his First Officer.

title: Command Performance
description: Alara must take command of the Orville when Ed and Kelly end up imprisoned in a replica of their old home.

title: About a Girl
description: Bortus and Klyden debate whether their newborn child should have a controversial surgery.

title: If the Stars Should Appear
description: The crew encounters a vessel adrift in space that's about to collide with a star.

title: Pria
description: Ed becomes smitten with the captain of a stranded ship, but Kelly suspects all is not what it seems.

title: Krill
description: Ed and Gordon are sent on an undercover mission to infiltrate a Krill ship and obtain a copy of their bible.

title: Majority Rule
description: Kelly leads a team to find two missing Union anthropologists on a planet similar to Earth.

title: Into the Fold
description: The crew set out to save Dr. Finn, her two sons and Isaac, after their shuttle gets thrown into uncharted space.

title: Cupid's Dagger
description: While the crew attempts to mediate a peace treaty between two warring cultures, tensions rise between Ed and Kelly when a familiar face comes aboard.

title: Firestorm
description: Alara questions whether she's fit for her job when a fire breaks out on the Orville and a crew member dies.

title: New Dimensions
description: The Orville gets damaged by a spatial anomaly causing harrowing effects to all living things.

title: Mad Idolatry
description: The crew crash land on a planet from another universe; Ed and Kelly consider getting back together.

title: Ja'loja
description: The crew face personal challenges on their way to witness Bortus perform a Moclan ceremony on his homeworld.

title: Primal Urges
description: The crew race to save a small group of survivors on a planet about to be destroyed by its sun.

title: Home
description: Ed, Gordon and Alara visit Alara's home planet of Xelayah.

title: Nothing Left on Earth Excepting Fishes
description: Ed finds himself behind enemy lines when he crash lands on a mysterious planet; Kelly questions why Gordon wants to take the Command Test.

title: All the World Is Birthday Cake
description: The Orville makes First Contact; A new crew member joins the ship.

title: A Happy Refrain
description: Claire's personal life takes an unexpected turn; Gordon makes an unusual grooming suggestion to Bortus.

title: Deflectors
description: The ship's deflectors upgrade leads to conflict between the Moclan culture and the crew.

title: Identity, Part I
description: When Issac shuts down, the crew head to his home planet to fix him, and uncover a shocking secret that was better off hidden.

title: Identity, Part II
description: The Kaylons take control of the Orville with the intention of destroying all biological lifeforms.

title: Blood of Patriots
description: Ed must initiate peace talks with the Krill.

title: Lasting Impressions
description: The crew opens a time capsule from 2015.

title: Sanctuary
description: Ed discovers that Moclans aboard the Orville are harboring a secret.

title: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
description: A time distortion affects Ed and Kelly's relationship.

title: The Road Not Taken
description: The crew must contend with the disastrous fallout from Kelly's decision.
